roc.tooltip_text:
The ROC plot is interactive. In point mode, click to select different operating point. 
 In line mode, select region of interest for partial AUC (constraining both TPR and FPR). The 1st click plots a horizontal line and 2nd click plots a vertical line.

utility.link_text: the Pauker-Kassier threshold approach to clinical decision making.

apar.tooltip_text: The ApAr communicates the range of prior probability and test cutoffs for which the model has positive utility (in other words, useful)
